issue.title: [CF 486] 'Don't refresh' box on combat event icons
issue.body:
I'm making an icon to track Honor Among Thieves' cooldown, and a 'Don't refresh' check box on the combat event icon type is all that's in my way now.


> Posted by CurseForge user pikapikatrap | Imported from CurseForge issue #486 | Raw

comments.body:
Sounds like a good idea.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Added in r575 (or somewhere around there)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
